headline.main: Volkswagen to Launch Budget Car Family in 2018: CEO in Paper
headline.print_headline: Volkswagen to Launch Budget Car Family in 2018: CEO in Paper

docs.snippet: Germany's Volkswagen plans to launch a family of low cost budget cars in China and possibly elsewhere starting in 2018, its chief executive said in a newspaper interview on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany's Volkswagen plans to launch a family of low cost budget cars in China and possibly elsewhere starting in 2018, its chief executive said in a newspaper interview on Sunday.

headline.main: Ferrer Withdraws From Wimbledon With Elbow Injury
headline.print_headline: Ferrer Withdraws From Wimbledon With Elbow Injury

docs.snippet: Spain's David Ferrer has pulled out of Wimbledon on the eve of the tournament because of an elbow injury, the All England Club said in a statement on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spain's David Ferrer has pulled out of Wimbledon on the eve of the tournament because of an elbow injury, the All England Club said in a statement on Sunday.

headline.main: Behind Silicon Valley’s Self-Critical Tone on Diversity, a Lack of Progress
headline.print_headline: Behind Silicon Valley’s Self-Critical Tone on Diversity, a Lack of Progress

docs.snippet: Tech giants like eBay, Facebook and Google acknowledge that they have work to do to increase diversity, but the repetition of that sentiment shows how little has changed....
docs.abstract: Tech giants like eBay, Facebook and Google acknowledge that they have work to do to increase diversity, but the repetition of that sentiment shows how little has changed.

headline.main: Communicating With Becker Not Cheating, Says Djokovic
headline.print_headline: Communicating With Becker Not Cheating, Says Djokovic

docs.snippet: Coaches will come under nearly as much scrutiny as the players over the next fortnight at Wimbledon with every facial gesture captured on the TV cameras and repeated in super slow motion....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coaches will come under nearly as much scrutiny as the players over the next fortnight at Wimbledon with every facial gesture captured on the TV cameras and repeated in super slow motion.

headline.main: Factbox: A Guide to Nuclear Talks Between Iran and Six Major Powers
headline.print_headline: Factbox: A Guide to Nuclear Talks Between Iran and Six Major Powers

docs.snippet: Iran and six world powers - the United States, Britain, France, Germany, Russia and China - are in what may be the final phase of negotiations aimed at securing a deal on sanctions relief in exchange for limits on Iranian nuclear activities....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran and six world powers - the United States, Britain, France, Germany, Russia and China - are in what may be the final phase of negotiations aimed at securing a deal on sanctions relief in exchange for limits on Iranian nuclear activities.

headline.main: Iran, Big Powers Plan to Keep Negotiating Beyond June 30
headline.print_headline: Iran, Big Powers Plan to Keep Negotiating Beyond June 30

docs.snippet: The six nations seeking to negotiate a long-term agreement with Iran to curb the most sensitive parts of its nuclear programme plan to continue negotiating beyond Tuesday's deadline, a senior U.S. official said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The six nations seeking to negotiate a long-term agreement with Iran to curb the most sensitive parts of its nuclear programme plan to continue negotiating beyond Tuesday's deadline, a senior U.S. official said.

headline.main: Lufthansa Readies Compensation for Germanwings Crash
headline.print_headline: Lufthansa Readies Compensation for Germanwings Crash

docs.snippet: Deutsche Lufthansa plans to make offers of compensation in the coming days to the families of those killed in the crash of a Germanwings jet in the French Alps in late March, a spokesman for the airline said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Deutsche Lufthansa plans to make offers of compensation in the coming days to the families of those killed in the crash of a Germanwings jet in the French Alps in late March, a spokesman for the airline said on Sunday.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Back to Tennis, and Focused on Wimbledon
headline.print_headline: Novak Djokovic Back to Tennis, and Focused on Wimbledon

docs.snippet: After losing in the French Open final, Novak Djokovic wanted nothing to do with tennis....
docs.lead_paragraph: After losing in the French Open final, Novak Djokovic wanted nothing to do with tennis.

headline.main: Russia Win Beach Soccer to Claim Final Gold of Games
headline.print_headline: Russia Win Beach Soccer to Claim Final Gold of Games

docs.snippet: Russia won gold in the beach soccer final against Italy on Sunday to bring the curtain down on the inaugural European Games in Azerbaijan....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia won gold in the beach soccer final against Italy on Sunday to bring the curtain down on the inaugural European Games in Azerbaijan.

headline.main: French Attack Suspect: Lone Wolf Islamist or 'Guy Who Flipped'?
headline.print_headline: French Attack Suspect: Lone Wolf Islamist or 'Guy Who Flipped'?

docs.snippet: Even as French investigators piece together a clearer picture of events that led on Friday to the beheading of a transport firm manager and attempted destruction of a chemicals plant, the real motivation of the chief suspect remains elusive....
docs.lead_paragraph: Even as French investigators piece together a clearer picture of events that led on Friday to the beheading of a transport firm manager and attempted destruction of a chemicals plant, the real motivation of the chief suspect remains elusive.
